name: ChargeSmart
description: Pay bills with a credit or debit card
overview:
The world of financial services is rapidly changing. What people value has evolved as technology has improved and new services have become available. Over the past several years, the bar has been raised significantly in terms of convenience, reliability, and efficiency.

ChargeSmart’sâ„¢ team is made up of financial, technical, and real estate experts who all recognize the importance of meeting and exceeding these ever-increasing expectations. With over 50 years of Wall Street, realty, and technology experience among them, they share a common goal to modernize the way people view all types of bill payment.

By creating a partner network with hundreds of billers, ChargeSmartâ„¢ acts as a one-stop-shop that provides all of the convenience that the modern consumer expects. Customers can submit payments directly to ChargeSmartâ„¢, indicating the dollar amount and intended recipient, and the rest is left to us. The ChargeSmartâ„¢ system processes and remits payments entirely electronically, so that every step from its initiation until its final destination is accounted for and traceable. Within two to three business days, the payment arrives not in an envelope at an office door, but as a posted credit to your account.

We don’t believe that paying bills is thought of by anyone as entertaining. In fact, we think the opposite, which is why we aim to make the process that much more quick and easy. With any suggestions to help us improve, we welcome and encourage feedback from our customers. Feel free to send us your suggestions at support@ChargeSmart.com.
